possible_reasons: 4. Ramp limit is deactivated and set ramp time is too short
activities: 3. Contact SEW Service for advice if the output stage is defective
4. Activate P138 and/or increase ramp time

possible_reasons: 1. Ground fault in the motor lead
3. Short circuit in the braking resistor circuit
4. Brake resistor has too high resistance
activities: 2. Check feeder cable to braking resistor
3. Check technical data of braking resistor
4. Replace MOVIDRIVE® if the brake chopper is defective

possible_reasons: 3. Short circuit in braking resistor circuit.
4. Braking resistor has too high resistance.
activities: 2. Check supply cable to braking resistor.
3. Check technical data of braking resistor.
2. Check supply cable to the braking resistor.
3. Check technical data of braking resistor.

possible_reasons: 1. Actual speed exceeded "Maximum speed at motor shaft" limit (index 8560.9/8361.9). This limit value is set at startup matching motor and gear unit.
1. Incorrect command detected during IPOSplus® program execution.
activities: 1. Check the content of the program memory and, if necessary, correct.
2. Load the correct program into the program memory.
1. Reduce load and/or provide for adequate cooling.

possible_reasons: 1. Control signal source not defined or defined incorrectly.
1. Encoder cable or shield not connected correctly
activities: 1. Check encoder cable and shield for correct connection, short circuit and broken wire

possible_reasons: 1. Inverter electronics disrupted, possibly due to effect of EMC
activities: 1. Check ground connections and shielding and correct, if necessary. Contact SEW service if this error occurs again.

possible_reasons: 1. Access to the EEPROM of the memory card has failed
activities: 1. Activate factory settings, perform reset and reset parameters.
2. Contact SEW service if the error occurs again.
2. Limit switches are swapped over in relation to direction of rotation of motor.

possible_reasons: 1. No communication between master and slave within the projected response monitoring.
activities: 1. Check communication routine of the master
2. Extend fieldbus timeout time (P819) or deactivate monitoring
